p:
When individual i is infected with subtype s, antibody titers increase from the time of infection and eventually peak. The acute boost occurs occurs according to f rise,
11

determines the dependence of the titer boost on the pre-infection titer. When positive, it allows for an antibody ceiling effect
54 , whereby higher pre-infection titers have smaller boosts (see Supplementary Discussion, Supplementary Tables 1 and 5, Supplementary Figs. 13–15).
